description: We are glad to introduce TYC COMMUNICATIONS NIG, operators of GKRADIO. Our company is fully registered with the corporate affairs commission of Nigeria, with a highly gifted Professional board of directors. The company has strong affiliations with international bodies in UK, South Africa and Canada. Overtime, we metamorphosed and birthed an online radio station called GKRADIO (God's Kingdom Radio) which was launched on the 18th of September 2020 with the sole aim of creating an alternative radio for a particular sect who have grown tired of the conventional radio stations where music contents are rarely censored to provide good moral, educative and entertaining standards. GKRADIO is designed to provide all information, educational, entertainment and an expression of the kingdom of Almighty God.

name: Koode Radio International
description: Koode Media Academy and Consultancy is a Nigeria registered organization with a focus to connect the Fulbe (also known as Fulanis, Peul or Fula) communities on its Koode Radio International (KRI) shortwave programmes designed to engage Fulfulde speakers by synchronizing the traditional and the modern methods to foster building blocks for early warnings and response mechanism for food security and livestocks, promotion of cultural literacy, strengthening of cultural awareness and protection of the Fulbe cultural heritage as well as promoting access, through mapping and identification of basic health services around cattle ranches and along the grazing routes. The KRI is an international radio station with Fulfulde as the major broadcasting language, evidently it‘s one of the most engendered language.

Naija Fm 102.7 na the original Naija radio station, with correct collabo of talk and music.

The music, no go be from only well known local musicians dem, but we go also dey support our upcoming brothers and sisters wey need avenue for their new music.
